title: 19 "The Sympathy of Kaoru's Disappointed Love - Part II"(Japanese:「薪能薫悲恋情」〜第三段〜) February 11, 2000(2000-02-11)
transformers_text: 19 The Sympathy of Ka or u's Disappointed Love Part II Japanese February 11 2000 2000 02 11 Aki reveals that Ko uei is in deep in debt for gambling and becomes the main suspect but Sakon reveals that the arrow was triggered by a timer making anyone the potential killer Because the crossbow was on a timer they cannot determine if Ku jou or Naoto was the target Naoto finds a threatening note in his room fired by the same crossbow that killed master Ku jou and then Aki is found stabbed to death by someone wearing an On i mask Following the attacker they find Ko uei dead in a crashed car with the On i mask and costume indicating that may have been the murderer all along
tf_idf_text: sympathy disappoint love part japanese february aki reveals uei deep debt gamble becomes main suspect sakon reveals arrow trigger timer make anyone potential killer crossbow timer cannot determine jou naoto target naoto find threatening note room fire crossbow kill master jou aki find stab death someone wear mask follow attacker find uei dead crash car mask costume indicate may murderer along
